item.content:encoded:
Forever in Our Hearts Photo Funeral Memorial Card

Top 5! Forever in Our Hearts Photo Funeral Memorial Card – Sympathy Cards Forever in Our Hearts Photo Funeral Memorial Card ready to ship the fastest Forever in Our Hearts Photo Funeral Memorial Card order now with fast delivery service to your hand as soon as possibleThis memorial card can be given as a keepsake at a Celebration of Life or funeral service or sent as a special tribute to those who were unable to attend. This card can be personalized with a favorite photograph of your loved one. The included poem is Let Me Go by Christina Rossetti but it can be easily changed to a prayer or poem of your choice. The card measures 3.5×2" so it fits nicely in a wallet, if you’d like it to be more durable change the paper option to Premium Silk. Price:$28.05

Top 5! Forever in Our Hearts Photo Funeral Memorial Card ($28.05)
